extension.summary: Polish Team Wizards
Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon.
extension.description: Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: 1.0.59: 29th May 2017 - 'Now playing' text now defined by SF due to skin variations

extension.summary: CHERRY TV Repository
extension.description: "CHERRY TV" podlega prawom własności intelektualnej należącym do KODI CHERRY.CHERRY TV nie udostepnia telewizji online,korzysta jedynie z kont premium udostepnionych w sieci.Zabrania się sprzedażny i rozpowszechniania.
extension.disclaimer: Kodi jest programem darmowym. Wtyczki, które są zawarte w projekcie CHERRY TV są również darmowe i powszechnie dostępne w internecie dla każdego. CHERRY TV nie dostarcza bezpośrednio telewizji, filmów, seriali, muzyki ani żadnych treści audio/wideo. CHERRY TV nie udostepnia telewizji online,korzysta jedynie z kont premium udostepnionych w sieci.Jest jedynie zbiorem wtyczek. Projekt ten ma jedynie ułatwić użytkownikowi ustawianie programu Kodiczy instalacje wtyczek . Jeżeli dana wtyczka nie działa zgodnie z założeniem należny kontaktować się z jej autorem. Jeżeli stan taki się utrzymuje dłużnej może zostać taka wtyczka usunięta oraz będzie szukana alternatywa.

extension.summary: MySQL Connector/Python
extension.description: MySQL Connector/Python is implementing the MySQL Client/Server protocol completely in Python. This means you don't have to compile anything or MySQL (client library) doesn't even have to be installed on the machine.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.

Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeonilta.
Complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][I]v6.0.5[/I][CR]- Fix color customization not opening[CR]- Small redesign of DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add and fix some Widget plugin paths[CR]- Revert PNG changes that altered panel colors[CR]- Add support for animated weather icons[CR]- Add background selection to Music Viz[CR]- Add LibreELEC to settings[CR][I]v6.0.4[/I][CR]- Compatibility updates for new Skin Helper version[CR]- Add manfeeds Video Lyrics mod v2 (thanks manfeed)[CR]- Add option to hide player control buttons on Music OSD[CR]- Redesigned System Settings screen[CR]- New logo (thanks GTunney!)[CR][I]v6.0.3[/I][CR]- Add player controls to sidemenu[CR]- Add option to disable Widget fanart[CR]- Shuffle skin settings with added catagories[CR]- Add FAQ in Help section[CR]- Add option to hide Home Window elements when pressing back[CR]- Add option to use paused label instead of image[CR]- Add snow to Music Viz background[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikeKodiCherry164/Aeon-Nox-KodiCherry/commits/master

extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and/or improvements[CR][I]v6.1.2[/I][CR]- Move Video OSD buttons above seekbar[CR]- Update VideoLyrics mod (thanks manfeed)[CR]- Misc PVR fixes and adjustments[CR]- Resize FSK rating images to fit in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Fixes for Rottentomatoes and Metacritic images and INFOlabels[CR]- Fullscreen Info updates, fixes, and changes[CR]- Use script.colorbox for blur in information dialogs[CR]- Rework DialogMusicInfo[CR][I]v6.1.1[/I][CR]- Fix custom Widget[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

extension.summary: Soft gradients, pixel highlights and visible fanart
extension.description: (fuse)neue utilises low list viewtypes throughout the skin in order to showcase fanart. The home menu bar is accessible from anywhere by pressing up, minimising the need to ever "go home".

extension.summary: Custom Made skin for easy Kodi
extension.description: Easy Skin Easy Kodi... based on axbmcuser Confluence mod
